headline: Eversource Energy Declares Common Dividend
summary: HARTFORD, Conn. & BOSTON, December 04, 2024--The Board of Trustees of Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) today approved a quarterly dividend of $0.715 per share, payable on December 31, 2024, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on December 18, 2024.

headline: Eversource (ES) Down 1.2% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Rebound?
summary: Eversource (ES) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.
